definition: labor and capital/labor and management
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
resources/capital/to provide/to supply/to support/money/expense
industrial relations/relations between labor and capital

sentences.english: Both labour and management were putting out feelers.
sentences.chinese: 劳资双方相互试探对方。

sentences.english: At the same time, the conflict between the employers and workers led to the strike.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，劳资双方的冲突也引起了一场罢工。

sentences.english: UK employment law embodies arbitration and conciliation mechanisms for settling industrial disputes.
sentences.chinese: 英国雇佣法包括解决劳资纠纷的仲裁和调解机制。

sentences.english: Under such a constructive culture the employee-employer relationship has always been harmony.
sentences.chinese: 在这种文化氛围下，公司的劳资关系相当和谐。

sentences.english: But given the company's history of poor labor relations, one must wonder.
sentences.chinese: 但鉴于该公司劳资关系记录不佳，人们须有所怀疑。

sentences.english: Design classes for the Labor-Management education.
sentences.chinese: 劳资教育课程之规划设计。

sentences.english: The article analysed the property right foundation of labor-capital relations above all.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先分析了劳资关系的产权基础。

sentences.english: They were tangled in the labour-management controversy.
sentences.chinese: 他们被卷入了劳资纠纷。

sentences.english: But they oppose efforts to limit collective bargaining.
sentences.chinese: 但是他们反对对限制劳资双方谈判的努力。

sentences.english: Labor and Capital relation is crucial in China's new-democratic economy.
sentences.chinese: 劳资关系是新民主主义经济的重要关系之一。

sentences.english: The two parties of labour and capital have bargained a new wage increase.
sentences.chinese: 劳资双方经谈判达成再次增加工资的协议。

sentences.english: The MSc Human Resource Management and Industrial Relations is a one year, full-time programme.
sentences.chinese: 海安人力资源管理和劳资关系是一年，全日制课程。

sentences.english: They mediated a settlement between labour and management.
sentences.chinese: 他们通过调停解决了劳资纠纷。

sentences.english: A long and bitter conflict between employers and workers affected the productivity.
sentences.chinese: 劳资双方持久而激烈的冲突影响了生产效率。

sentences.english: Disputes are especially common in the Pearl River manufacturing area in southeastern China.
sentences.chinese: 劳资矛盾在中国东南部的珠江三角制造区特别普遍。

sentences.english: Workers commonly complain that causes for labor disputes rest solely on the shoulders of management .
sentences.chinese: 工人经常抱怨劳资纠纷的责任完全在管理者的肩上。

definition: euphemistic equivalent of 他媽的|他妈的[ta1 ma1 de5]
Nyima county, Tibetan: Nyi ma rdzong in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet
(slang) shoot!/crap!
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
(Internet slang) (substitute for 我肏[wo3 cao4]) fuck/WTF
to stop one's pen/to break off writing/final remarks (at the end of a book or article)
aw, fuck! (loanword from Korean 아! 씨발!)
dick/penis (vulgar)
my old mother/I, this old woman/my old lady (colloquial)/maternal grandmother/midwife
variant of 傻屄[sha3 bi1]
(substitute for 我肏[wo3 cao4]) fuck/WTF
(dialect) what are you doing?/what the hell?
(dialect) Beat it!/Scram!/Fuck off!
(slang) little biyatch (variation of 小婊子)
(Internet slang) I can't even.../Are you kidding me!/OMG!
see 肏你媽|肏你妈[cao4 ni3 ma1]
